basics.name: Shabhareesh Komirishetty
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: Shabhareesh is a experienced software engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the internet industry. Skilled in Machine Learning/Data Engineering with a Master's degree in Computer Science from University of Illinois at Chicago. He likes and yearns to learn on the job and apply new ideas to solve challenging and interesting problems.

work.summary: Working on building a recommender system which predicts if an app is likely to be installed by user by computing probable click through rate / conversion rate using Logistic Regression Algorithm.
highlights: App Install Click / Install Event Attribution

work.summary: Working on building a Machine Learning Pipeline which categorize publisher's into different buckets to maximize their revenue.
highlights: K means Clustering / Gaussian Mixture Models

work.summary: Built a Spam Detection System that detects fraud publishers using various publisher metrics such as ads requested, ads returned, click through rate, impression fill rate etc.
Built an application that provides a mapping between different system identifiers of yahoo with the device ID’s of the mobile which helps to join the user behavior on desktop to behavior on mobile.
highlights: Attribution of User Activity on Yahoo Eco System

work.summary: Worked on developing Storm topologies for processing serve /impressions / clicks / conversion data sets with lambda architecture to extract Advertiser and Publisher Metrics which are exposed by Druid API’s.

publications.name: TAC optimization
publications.summary: Method to optimize ex-TAC revenue for Yahoo by regulating supply.

references.name: Vishnu Nath
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Shabhareesh, He is a very active and knowledgeable professional who puts in his very best to achieve the required goals. He is extremely committed to the tasks assigned to him and delivers consistently. All this, coupled with his extensive work experience, make him a valuable addition to any team.
